paper_abstract: In this paper we study the trace spectra of polynomial bases for F-2n over F-2. Shparlinski showed that there exists a polynomial basis having 0 (log n) elements of trace one. Here we show that for every t <= n, there exists a polynomial basis having t + O (log n) elements of trace one. We also study consequences of our results to the existence of irreducible polynomials of certain weights.
paper_title: The trace spectra of polynomial bases for F(2)n
